tenants.roleAssignDesc: Below are the available tenant roles you can assign to a user. A checkmark shows roles currently assigned to this user. Select additional role(s) to update their permissions.

groups.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the group "{groupName}"?
groups.sharedServicesDesc: Click 'Edit' to start assigning roles. Choose the roles you want to add to your Group from each available Shared Service, then click 'Save' to apply your changes.
groups.sharedServicesSavedDesc: The roles for this group have been successfully updated.
groups.sharedServicesSaveErrorDesc: There was an error updating the roles {error}. Please try again.
groups.undoRoleModalDesc: You're about to undo your current selections and restore the previously assigned roles. Are you sure you want to continue?
groups.clearAllRoleModalDesc: You're about to delete all of your current role selections. Are you sure you want to continue?
